pages.title: Quick Lookup
pages.text: $(br)To improve the guide, we added a $(key)Quick Lookup$() feature to $(key)$(italic)Magic Guide$()!$(br2)There are two ways to use it:$(br)$(list)$(bold)In the inventory screen, hover an item and hold Ctrl$()$(br)$(list)$(bold)In the world, aim at a block, hold $(key)$(italic)Magic Guide$() and sneak-right-click$()$(br2)
$(t:How's that? Sounds a bit like Botania's Lexica Botania — a salute to the veterans of magic :>)—Then you'll jump to the entry for that item/block in this book (if any)!$()
